response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs and expectations. We believe its value extends far beyond its tangible aspects, making it an investment in quality and excellence. Given its worth to us, we're offering it to you at a special introductory price of $13,500. This is a unique opportunity to secure such a valuable asset at a competitive rate. Please let us know if this proposal aligns with your interests and budget.", "product_price": 13500}
